name: @codefee-component/core
description: A Core UI Web Components for Codefee Works. This project is built using Stencil.

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:angular && npm run build:react
scripts.build:angular: cd exports/angular && npm run build && cd../..
scripts.build:react: cd exports/react && npm run build && cd../..
scripts.v:patch: npm run v:patch:core && npm run v:patch:angular && npm run v:patch:react
scripts.v:patch:angular: cd exports/angular/projects/main && npm version patch && cd../../../..
scripts.v:patch:react: cd exports/react && npm version patch && cd../../
scripts.pub: npm run pub:core && npm run pub:angular && npm run pub:react
